text: Uha hi hai jisa ne akasam ate dharati nu che dinam vica paida kita phira uha sighasana te susobhita ho'i'a. Uha janada hai jihara kujha dharati de adara janda hai ate jo kujha usa vicom nikalada hai. Ate jo kujha asamanam tom utarada hai jam jo kujha asamanam vica carada hai. Ate uha tuhade nala hai, tusim jithe vi ho ate jo kujha tusim karade ho alaha usa nu dekhada hai
